app_pitch: Insights, forecasts and trade ideas for crypto traders
home_intro_1: We develop valuation tools and price forecasting models for cryptocurrencies and their derivatives.
home_intro_2: Subscribe now to receive exclusive Bitcoin price forecasts in the CryptOptions newsletter.
home_intro_3: Please keep in mind that this is not financial advice. Don't trust, do verify and do your own research.
home_intro_4: We develop analytics for cryptocurrencies and coin indexes providing insights about current trends of the crypto market
data_access_limited: This is a beta version, data access is limited. Please retry shortly or click the button below
pearson_correlation: Note: These Pearson correlation coefficients are calculated over the last daily prices in
BTC_ETH_historical_prices: Historical prices of BTC and ETH
calculated_over_daily_returns: Calculated over the last daily returns
crypto_major_index_desc: â“˜ We've designed the Major coins index to provide investors with a metric revealing current trend of major coins, namely Bitcoin, Ethereum and Solana.
crypto_major_index_desc_2: This index has exposure to Bitcoin, but other components of the index are stakable coins. A portfolio based on the index components would yield returns from staking, provide the coin are staked.
sharpe_ratio_definition: The Sharpe ratio measures the performance of an investment compared to a risk-free asset, after adjusting for its risk. A Sharpe ratio of 1.5 indicates that the investment is generating 1.5 units of excess return for each unit of risk taken, relative to the risk-free rate
calculated_over_last_year: Calculated over one year of daily returns
